long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brickway is an exciting Chrome Extension game that challenges your sliding path-making skills. With 36 engaging stages, your objective is to reach the exit portal safely without flying off into space. The game can also be played for free on the website retrobowls.org.

In Brickway, each stage presents a unique puzzle where you must navigate through a maze-like path. Along the way, you'll encounter energy orbs that need to be collected in some stages, while others feature timer blocks that must be activated to destroy obstacles.

Precision and strategy are key in Brickway. You'll need to carefully plan your moves to avoid falling off the edges and ensure a successful journey to the exit portal. Each stage presents its own set of challenges, requiring you to think critically and make precise sliding maneuvers.

Playing Brickway on retrobowls.org offers a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience. The website provides a user-friendly interface and smooth gameplay, allowing you to focus on solving each stage's puzzle. With its addictive gameplay and variety of challenges, Brickway guarantees hours of entertainment and brain-teasing fun.

Challenge yourself to conquer all 36 stages, mastering the art of sliding and puzzle-solving. With its sleek design and intuitive controls, Brickway delivers a captivating experience. Visit retrobowls.org today and put your sliding skills to the test with Brickway.
